shutter: 1/4000 to 30 s in steps of 1/3 EV, bulb
lcdmonitor: 3-in. (7.5cm)., approx. 230k-dot TFT LCD with brightness adjustment
weight: Approx. 505 g with battery and memory card but without body cap
flash: Flash sync speed: X=1/200 s; synchronizes with shutter at 1/200 s or slower
memorycard: SD (Secure Digital), SDHC, SDXC, and Eye-Fi memory cards
lens: AF-S DX Nikkor 18-105mm f/3.5-5.6G ED VR
interface: Hi-Speed USB, Type C HDMI connector
other: Retouch functions: D-Lighting, red-eye correction, trim, monochrome, filter effects, color balance, small picture, image overlay, NEF (RAW) processing, quick retouch, straighten, distortion control, fisheye, color outline, perspective control, miniature effect, edit movie
focusing: Single-point AF, dynamic-area AF, auto-area AF, 3D-tracking (11 points)
shooting: Up to 3 fps (manual focus, mode M or S, shutter speed 1/250 s or faster, and other settings at default values)
whitebalance: Auto (TTL white balance with main image sensor and 420-pixel RGB sensor); incandescent, fluorescent (7 types), direct sunlight, flash, cloudy, shade, preset manual, all except preset manual with fine tuning.
exposurecontrol: Exposure compensation: -5 to +5 EV in increments of 1/3 EV; ISO sensitivity (Recommended Exposure Index): ISO 100 to 3200 in steps of 1 EV; can also be set to approx. 2 EV above ISO 3200 (ISO 12800 equivalent); auto ISO sensitivity control available
